author: By Ben Zimmer
title: Is ‘Epicenter’ the Wrong Word for New York?
description: Some worry that the go-to headline word actually hurts our ability to fight the disease.
content:
There are good reasons people use epicenter: Its a dramatic and scientific-sounding word, with strong echoes of disaster, and it captures peoples attention. 
But there are also reasons not to use it. The first round of complaints about epicenter argued that … [+5210 chars]
